numlitem.para: For ER operations, remaining valve is exercised during the last hour of flight.

placard.para: Placard affected Crossfeed Valve Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open main gear doors and install door locks.

warning.para: REFER TO MAINTENANCE MANUAL 32-00-15 FOR LOCK INSTALLATION PROCEDURE. RAPID ACTION OF DOORS MAY CAUSE INJURY OR DAMAGE IF LOCKS ARE NOT PROPERLY INSTALLED.

numlitem.para: Gain access to affected valve actuator. Aft valve is in left w/w aft spar. Forward valve is in right w/w aft spar. Just left and right of keel beem.
Remove, cap, and stow electrical connector from affected valve actuator.
Move manual override handle to the fully closed position and lockwire closed.
Pull and collar affected valve C/B:
